INFO_BUSINESS:
**ğŸ”— Business connection**

You can connect the bot to your business and get the ID of any chat.
> Go to settings > Telegram Business > Chatbot > and select this bot
Then you can send the command `.id` in any private chat to get the chat ID.
You can also get the ID without sending a message in the chat!
> Go to the chat and then click on the bot management button and the bot will send the ID of the chat you came from
BUSINESS_CONNECTION:
**ğŸ”— Business connection**

> You can also get the ID without sending a message in the chat!
> Go to the chat and then click on the bot management button and the bot will send the ID of the chat you came from
